messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: [A-Za-z]+\s*'

Imagine a group of friends: Fatima, Ana, Robert, Sophie, Nick, Kiran, and Julia. Fatima introduces you to two of her friends, Ana and Robert. Ana introduces you to Sophie, who introduces you to Kiran. Kiran has a Toyota Camry to give away. You do not take the car, you’re just learning about the environment. Then you start over with Fatima introducing you to Robert, who introduces you to Nick, and Nick introduces you to Julia. Julia has a Ferrari to give away. You do not take the car, you’re just learning about the environment. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the most valuable car. Which friend from Fatima's introductions will lead to the path where one can get the most valuable car?

You should introduce yourself to Ana, then Kiran. These friends of Ana and Kiran are the ones who can give you the most valuable car in return. Answer: Robert\s Maria\s Kiran

You will become a prominent scientist. You will study all fields of knowledge. You will become a contemporary of everyone. You will do everything on your own. You will read, study, analyze and make discoveries in physics, mathematics, chemistry, engineering, medicine, zoology, psychology, archeology, history, geography, arts, linguistics, anthropology, ethnology, religion, philosophy, literature, music, sociology, ecology, anthropology, sports, science fiction, astrophysics, politics, ancient civilizations, astronomy, economics, computers, programming, economy, trade, accounting, law, electronic warfare, electronics, photography, video, photonics, vehicles, aviation, navigation, topography, oceanography, taxes, cryonics, pharmacology, terrorism, languages, eating habits, drinking habits, fashion, health, diet, clothing, family, education, architecture, travel, as well as all other fields of knowledge.

You have the right to choose what to read and make your own knowledge out of it. Your knowledge will be useful for others. The use of your knowledge will be free of charge. You should have a tree with as many branches as your interests. The areas where you are the best are the branches of the tree in which you read the most. The branches of the tree will all grow in different rates. The number of branches of the tree can not be greater than the number of books that you can read. The process of reading a book is very costly. Knowledge and its application will have an impact on your life. Sometimes only the knowledge of living in poverty is enough. You may choose to be a mediocre or a prodigy.

Now imagine you meet a new friend, Mike, who introduces you to Alex, and then Alex introduces you to Julia. You call Fatima and choose the previous path that led to the most valuable car, Fatima tells you that the friend with the most valuable car is not talking to anyone. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the most valuable car. Which friend from Fatima's introductions will lead to the path where one can get the most valuable car?
You should introduce yourself to Alex, then Julia. These friends of Alex and Julia are the ones who can give you the most valuable car in return. Answer: Mike\'s Anna\'s Julia
